pullRequest.body:
[Upstreaming from PFR project](https://teorth.github.io/pfr/docs/PFR/ForMathlib/FiniteMeasureProd.html)

This PR defines binary products of finite measures and probability measures. 

---

 * In PFR project, the continuous dependence of a product measure on the factors (in the topology of weak convergence) was shown and applied for probability measures on finite types. This continuity is not included in the PR: in Mathlib the plan is to later show that product measures depend continuously on their factors when the underlying space is metrizable and separable.
